item.description:
5/19 I just found out that this is part of the Research Members Only
Event. I cannot say what the movies are. The Research Group
Has informed their members what the Movies are.

Tickets at an undiscosed cost must be brought for this event.
Sorry, I just recently found out that this is a Research Group
Members Only Event so non members cannot take part in it.

I am not sure if there will be room for me to attend until
a little before the date of the event.

The Research Group is having a Movie Screening on the
Evening of June 5.

http://www.sgra.org/p...

www.sgra.org/paracon/

SGRA has brought some issues to my attention.
My way of handling those issues is to have this memo in all
SGRA Meet Ups in 2009.
SGRA Events ARE NOT TOTALLY FREE.
They have raffle and meal tickets that cost money.
Some events have booklets that cost money.
SGRA and the Vendors sell products that cost money.
Psychics and others give readings that cost money.
You can go on their site of

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org

For more details and some things can be
Purchased on line.

SGRA asks for a donation for attending some of their events.
(Yea, I know. You can talk to them about the difference between
a donation and charging admission. I am not getting involved.)
item.how_to_find_us: Research Group are POCs for this Event

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Research Members attend Movie Screening at Ho Jos on June 5
